sources.description:
The Screaming Skull is a motion picture that reaches its climax in shocking horror. Its impact is so terrifying that it may have an unforeseen effect...it may kill you.

Original title: The Screaming Skull (1958) 

Black and White version https://youtu.be/mVVf6Zdxifw

Director: Alex Nicol
Writer: John Kneubuhl
Stars: John Hudson, Peggy Webber, Russ Conway, Alex Nicol
Genre: Classics, Cult Movies, Horror, Thriller, Mystery & Suspense

This movie comes subtitled in more than 30 languages. Click on ⚙️ and choose subtitles and/or audio tracks.

00:00 Full Movie
00:48  The Screaming Skull is a horror film that can have a deadly effect on viewers, leading producers to offer a funeral to anyone who dies of fright while watching it.
08:35  Jenny meets Mickey and learns about his connection to Marianne.
19:09  Eric and Jenny discuss the death of Marianne and Jenny's fears about her resemblance to Marianne.
21:35  A couple discusses their grief over the loss of a loved one and strange occurrences in their home.
39:00  A man confesses to his wife that he is responsible for the death of their child and his ex-wife, and that he spent time in a sanatorium for it.
45:35  Eric tries to help Jenny overcome her fears and burn a portrait that triggers her memories, but strange occurrences continue to happen.
53:59  A mysterious skull is found and Eric becomes obsessed with it, leading to strange events and a tragic outcome.
